entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h near noon. High 14. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
